ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Unicorn horn and wind bonus
ygData.msgSnippet: ... leave ... heh heh heh. ... songs ... and ... another ... Yow, that s a bummer.  I usually just bolt thru there and don t stop for anything.  I did get
ygData.messageBody:
>OK, I actually tried to get someone in-game to help me with my math but all

>those that could have helped were busy killing things... hehe
>
>Sheesh, 32 years old and a complete math dunce; which is why I usually
leave
>the in-depth analysis to people like John Kim(TM)... =8^)

heh heh heh.

>Oh, additionally, seeing that minotaur horns were much better for wind
songs
>than my Unicorn Horn (which seem to be wrong now.. hehe) I cruised through
>Beholder to pick one up. Of course I decided to be really really stupid
and
>invised myself into Runnyeye where I proceded to get killed by severy WAY
>green gobbies and evil eyes. Of course I lost my newly-gained level 41 and

>half a bub of hell exp... OUCH! All rez-capable clerics were all deep
>ended up camping and I'll give it another go tonight; I think I have
another
>hour and a half left before I'm un-rezzable.

Yow, that's a bummer. I usually just bolt thru there and don't stop for
anything. I did get charmed by an evil eye once though and killed an entire
party of wounded adventurer's. They were all dark elves though so I didn't
feel too bad. Not my fault I had an obsidian shard and gnoll lariat
equipped. It took them two deaths to figure out what was going on and by
that time the evil eye had them engaged as well.

Kit
